decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): ZDD W3 0AB REV A: 101 (site location plan); ZDD W3 0AB REV A: 201 (existing site block plan); ZDD W3 0AB REV A: 301 (existing layouts); ZDD W3 0AB REV A: 302 (existing front rear elevations); ZDD W3 0AB REV A: 303 (existing section AA- BB); ZDD W3 0AB REV B: 401 (proposed site block plan); ZDD W3 0AB REV B: 402 (proposed layouts); ZDD W3 0AB REV B: 403 (proposed layouts); ZDD W3 0AB REV B: 404 (proposed layout ground floor); ZDD W3 0AB REV B: 405 (proposed layout first floor); ZDD W3 0AB REV B: 406 (proposed layout loft floor); ZDD W3 0AB REV B: 407 (proposed layout roof floor); ZDD W3 0AB REV A: 502 (existing-proposed rear elevations); ZDD W3 0AB REV A: 601 (existing-proposed section AA); ZDD W3 0AB REV A: 602 (existing-proposed section BB); ZDD W3 0AB REV A: 701 (fire strategy layouts); Design and access statement.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The hereby approved one rooflight to the roof slope of the hereby approved development shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the  area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Single storey rear infill extension; rear roof extension incorporating a Juliet balcony, and installation of oner oof light to front roofslope.
